content.content: Grants Community Call2880×1524 224 KB  Time in your local-timezone format: 2021-04-06T16:00:00Z  Join Details Add to your Google calendar Join through the Zoom, Passcode 731569  Agenda Today’s discussion will be all things grants! @amyjung will be joined by @monet-supply, analyst in the Risk core unit at MakerDAO, delegate for numerous Protocols, and reviewer at Uniswap’s UNI Grants Program. Anyone interested in developing a Grants core unit, having a grants program in their core unit, or curious about grants in general are welcome to join. Community members are welcome and encouraged to participate in the call by asking questions and engaging in discussions.  Information About Grants The Maker Foundation Development Grants Program Sunset Announcement Call for Proposals: Grants Uniswap Grants Proposal Compound Grants Ethereum Foundation Ecosystem Support Program
So excited for this, a grants Core Unit seems almost fundamental IMO. So many great ideas and talents circling the DAO, can’t wait to hear about the smartest way to get them some DAI!
Very excited for this! Please share the recording for sure, this is a great topic.
Had a great chat. Thank you to everyone who joined! Recording is up! https://youtu.be/iGxgDsPdbuw
